MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the EH1 postcode area of Edinburgh. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10.33pm. Our engineers have arrived onsite at the Cockburn Street substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:45am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:08am on 19th December 2020.
